content.description:
Around the corner from

Godzilla

lies this fun dyno.

Hop up to the jug, set your feet, and jump to the big jug at the lip!
content.location: It is on the downhill side of the Godzilla Boulder.

content.description: Godzilla is a classic problem up the steep backside-face of the Godzilla Boulder. Start up a slightly overhanging groove (on great rock) following small crimps to gain a vertical seam. Techy footwork and a throw to a jug/horn leads to the top. Incredible climbing! Four stars for sure!
content.protection: This is kind of a highball problem, but the landings is good and the crux is down low. A couple pads should be good.
content.location: This is on Godzilla Boulder, in the Main Area, on Arthur's Rock.

content.description: This is a great face problem uphill of the arete left of the classic Godzilla. Begin on the same low jug as the seldom done Four Dollar Arete (V10). Make a big move left off the jug to small sidepull, move up on good edges and sidepulls before making a final big throw to a jug on the lip. Techy footwork and great rock make this a classic problem.
content.location: This is on Godzilla Boulder. Use the same starting hold as Four Dollar Arete, about 15 feet left of Godzilla.

content.description:
This is ultra classic.

Begin seated matched on the jug where

Mainstreet

starts, and move up through a bad pinch and worse undercling. The crux is probably the big move to the good crimp rail.
content.location:
Do the same start as

Mainstreet

.
